name: v-server
description: a web server support live realod ,also support webpack

scripts.r:patch: npm run bili && standard-version --release-as patch && git push --follow-tags origin master && npm publish
scripts.release: npm run build && standard-version && git push --follow-tags origin master && npm publish
scripts.release:first: npm run build && standard-version --first-release && git push --follow-tags origin master && npm publish
scripts.release:major: npm run build && standard-version --release-as major && git push --follow-tags origin master && npm publish
scripts.release:minor: npm run build && standard-version --release-as minor && git push --follow-tags origin master && npm publish
scripts.release:patch: npm run build && standard-version --release-as patch && git push --follow-tags origin master && npm publish
